metadata.title: USN-5937-1 -- Opusfile vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Opusfile was not properly validating pointer arguments in some of its functions, which could lead to a NULL pointer dereference. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or have other unspecified impacts.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5937-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libopusfile-doc - 0.9+20170913-1ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1 libopusfile-dev - 0.9+20170913-1ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1 libopusfile0 - 0.9+20170913-1ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
